name: Dr. Knoell Consult GmbH
memberOrga: All our affiliates are included in our website: www.knoell.de
goal: Dr. Knoell Consult GmbH is a scientific regulatory consultancy providing services to the private sector in the areas of risk-assessement and technical support for product registration. Dr. Knoell Consult GmbH is a private and for-profit organization (family own) headquarted in Germany and opperating accross several countries in Europe and beyond. Our remit is to provide high-quality dossiers and risk-assessment for product Registration accross different regulatory Frameworks: chemicals, agriculture, medical devices, animal health. Dr. Knoell Consult GmbH supports all technical and scientific aspects during the registration process of chemicals (and other products) in several regions: Europe, Americas, Asia and Africa.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Development, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Trade
euInitiatives: Only technical guidance documents and implementing regulations under the framework of chemicals, plant protection/fertilizers, food and animal feed and animal health.
